item.title: Licence
item.description: Licence makes it easy to create a beautiful map for free using QGIS. Customize anything on your map with widgets, themes, and language packs. Introduction Conformant Licenses Understanding Free Cultural Works Licensing types Linked Data Open data in Italia Choose an open source license Licensing a repository
